titles.title: Foreclosure Fairness Act of 2015
To allow homeowners facing foreclosure to avoid deficiency judgments, and for other purposes.
Foreclosure Fairness Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Regulatory Reform, Commercial And Antitrust Law.

bill.summary:
Foreclosure Fairness Act of 2015
Prohibits a court, in the case of any federally related mortgage loan made after enactment of this Act, from entering a deficiency judgment requiring the mortgagor to pay any balance on the mortgage loan after a foreclosure sale of the mortgaged property.
